verses.name: John 4:18
verses.text: For thou hast had five husbands; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband: in that saidst thou truly.

verses.name: John 4:19
verses.text: The woman saith unto him, Sir, I perceive that thou art a prophet.

verses.name: John 4:20
verses.text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain; and ye say, that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship.

verses.name: John 4:21
verses.text: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, believe me, the hour cometh, when ye shall neither in this mountain, nor yet at Jerusalem, worship the Father.

verses.name: John 4:22
verses.text: Ye worship ye know not what: we know what we worship: for salvation is of the Jews.
